ofx:listing.ofx:raw:
apt-key adv --keyserver hkp://keyserver.ubuntu.com:80 --recv EA312927 echo "deb http://repo.mongodb.org/apt/debian jessie/mongodb-org/3.2 main" | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/mongodb-org-3.2.list apt-get update apt-get install -y mongodb-org
systemctl --system daemon-reload systemctl enable mongod.service systemctl start mongod.service
